Plot: When an incomplete signal for help is sent by the survivor of the events depicted in Aliens (1986), another unit of colonial marines is sent to investigate.
Title: Aliens: Colonial Marines
Writer: Nick Bennett (battle chatter), Kal-El Bogdanove (battle chatter), Chris Faiella (battle chatter), Jared Hedges (additional dialogue), Dana Melton (battle chatter), Chad Quandt (battle chatter), Bradley Thompson, David Weddle
Actors: Michael Biehn, Lance Henriksen, Mark Rolston, Al Matthews
